mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_info ( original_name, s3_key, s3_url, bucket_name, file_size, file_type, upload_by, upload_date ) VALUES ( #{originalName}, #{s3Key}, #{s3Url}, #{bucketName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, #{uploadBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT file_id, original_name, s3_key, s3_url, bucket_name, file_size, file_type, upload_by, upload_date FROM file_info WHERE file_id = #{fileId}
SELECT file_id, original_name, s3_key, s3_url, bucket_name, file_size, file_type, upload_by, upload_date FROM file_info ORDER BY upload_date DESC
